doc.title: Context Menu
doc.description: Lets Create User and Message Context Menu Commands

body.raw:
These Context Menu Commands Look like This ![User Context Menu](/docs/userContextMenu-Discord.png)
![Message Context Menu](/docs/messageContext-Discord.png) Source: Discord You can create these commands using the `ContextMenu` class ```ts import { ContextMenu } from "https://deno.land/x/denocordts/mod.ts"; const menu = new ContextMenu().setName("greet").setType("User"); ``` Context Menu Commands can be registered in the same way Slash Commands are registered. Read Here
